full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA RDO RJE GCOD PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @063B BCOM @064A *, ,LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, GNAS BRTAN RAB 'BYOR DANG, DGE SLONG DE DAG DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DE DAG DANG, 'KHOR BZHI PO DGE SLONG DANG, DGE SLONG MA DANG, DGE BSNYEN DANG, DGE BSNYEN MA DANG, LHA DANG, MI DANG LHA MA YIN DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN YI RANGS TE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA RDO RJE GCOD PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO, ,)
